rule.control: The <RptgPrd>.<FrDt> must be in the form YYYY-MM-01.
rule.error_message: The Reporting From date is not valid.

rule.control: The <RptgPrd>.<ToDt> must be in the form YYYY-MM-DD, where DD must be the last calendar day of the MM month.
rule.error_message: The Reporting To date is not valid.
